topic: Doctor's Certificate and Course Retake Information

correspondence.message: I will have a doctor's certificate in English soon and have registered for the retake exam of the Operations Research course on October 2nd. I hope to take another course next semester if granted an extension. Thank you for your help."

Please refer to our website on prolongations (https://www.cit.tum.de/en/cit/studies/students/advising/informatics/tips-for-successful-studies/hardship-application/) for details regarding the doctor's certificate. Also, make sure to join one of the advisors' consultation hours.
